name: Zenith A30-Pierce Hylo Table
descr:
A30-Zenith-Pierce Hylo with auto cocking air drops

Standard Features:
5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Key Dimension Headpiece
Universal Headraiser- Raises & Tilts 
Adjustable Front Section
Forward Motion Headpiece w/pneumatic Auto-cocking Lo-Force® Drop Mechanism
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Sure Step Footswitch
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop w/pneumatic Auto-Cocking Lo-Force® Drop Mechanism
Swingaway Abdominal- Single Tension 
Slide & Crank Pelvic
Terminal Point Pelvic Drop w/pneumatic Auto-Cocking Lo-Force® Drop Mechanism
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion
Sensation Upholstery 
Platinum Base Color
Table Specifications:
Length 89”
Height 22” (optional 24”, 26”, or 28")
Width 24”
Weight 395 lbs.
Custom Comfort Choices -
Cushions:
Width: 18” or 21” 
Upholstery:
Style: Rilex or Traditional
Type: Sensation, Leather, Heritage
